en.title: Achievers Recognition Dinner, Manila,13th September 2008 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Club Filipino, Greenhills, Manila on the 13th September, 2008 was another SUCCESSFUL event attended by 600 Members, Leaders, VIPs and invited guests. There were many testimonials shared on the stage by FE's Spokesmen, Leaders and users of FE's amazing Quantum Pendant. 40 children from Judge Lorenzo's Lighthouse Center for Children's Foundation were invited to share dinner with FE. These children from Payatas Smoky Mountains area ( which is a huge rubbish dump) has never been to a function or had food like this before in their lives. They were invited to the stage where they sang a medley of songs for the audience.The excited look on their faces was thank you enough for all of us. It gave us more motivation and determination to work harder to build FE into a global success whereby we can help change more lives for the better!

A BIG THANK YOU to Jeremy Looi, Country Licensee of Philippines and to Dr Anarie Reyes and Effren Fortuna , MCs for the night for doing a GREAT job, as always!  The energy aand passion from the MCs can be felt through out the evening!

Other Highlights of the Event are:

- Speeches by Jeremy Looi, Paul Ting, VIP Sergio R Ortiz- Luiz Jr (Chairman Philippines Chamber of Commerce).

- Sharing of Testimonials by FE Spokesmen Monsour Del Rosario (Filipino Tae Kwondo Ambassador, Movie Superstar and Olympic Medallist) , Samboy Lim (Legendary " Skywalker" of the Philippines Basketball Assoc ), Allan Caidic (Legendary " Triggerman" of the Philippines Basketball Assoc)

- Product Demo by Samboy Lim, including lifting of Mr Universe 2006, Ringo Borlain, who weigh a massive 240 pounds! Ringo gave a great testimonial on FE's Quantum Pendant.

- Recognition of new FE Directors in Philippines.

- Appearance of the Ginebra Kings Basketball Team players, Ronald Tubid, Paul Artad, Johnny Abbarientos, Sunday Salvacion and Mike Holper. Ginebra Kings won the prestigious Fiesta Cup recently and are firm believers and users of FE's Quantum Pendant and Flask. Allan Caidic and Samboy Lim presented Ginebra Kings jerseys to Paul Ting, Jeremy Looi and KC Phoon.

- Appearance by Daisy Reyes, famous Filipino actress and personality.

- Sharing of testimonials by Quantum Pendant users  Dr Winona Bernas Amante (who was suffering from breast cancer and who has benefitted greatly from using FE's QP) , Mr Sam Amante (husband of Dr Winona), Ms Divine Gallaguez,  Attorney Batacan  (prominent lawyer and Legal Council to Congressman Valencia).

- Speech by Pastor Art Medina. What a powerful speaker ! Ahooo! (those who attended the function or watch the movie "300 " will understand what Ahooo! means).

- Closing Speech by Presidential Director KC Phoon, who as usual was truly inspirational!

- Lucky Draws and TV interviews by ABS-CBN's Swak program which will be broadcasted to the Filipino community in Philippines and worldwide.
 
< Click here for more photos >

FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at Club Filipino, Greenhills, Manila on the 13th September, 2008 was another SUCCESSFUL event attended by 600 Members, Leaders, VIPs and invited guests. There were many testimonials shared on the stage by FE's Spokesmen, Leaders and users of FE's amazing Quantum Pendant. 40 children from Judge Lorenzo's Lighthouse Center for Children's Foundation were invited to share dinner with FE. These children from Payatas Smoky Mountains area ( which is a huge rubbish dump) has never been to a function or had food like this before in their lives. They were invited to the stage where they sang a medley of songs for the audience.The excited look on their faces was thank you enough for all of us. It gave us more motivation and determination to work harder to build FE into a global success whereby we can help change more lives for the better!
A BIG THANK YOU to Jeremy Looi, Country Licensee of Philippines and to Dr Anarie Reyes and Effren Fortuna , MCs for the night for doing a GREAT job, as always! The energy aand passion from the MCs can be felt through out the evening!
Other Highlights of the Event are:
- Speeches by Jeremy Looi, Paul Ting, VIP Sergio R Ortiz- Luiz Jr (Chairman Philippines Chamber of Commerce).
- Sharing of Testimonials by FE Spokesmen Monsour Del Rosario (Filipino Tae Kwondo Ambassador, Movie Superstar and Olympic Medallist) , Samboy Lim (Legendary " Skywalker" of the Philippines Basketball Assoc ), Allan Caidic (Legendary " Triggerman" of the Philippines Basketball Assoc)
- Product Demo by Samboy Lim, including lifting of Mr Universe 2006, Ringo Borlain, who weigh a massive 240 pounds! Ringo gave a great testimonial on FE's Quantum Pendant.
- Recognition of new FE Directors in Philippines.
- Appearance of the Ginebra Kings Basketball Team players, Ronald Tubid, Paul Artad, Johnny Abbarientos, Sunday Salvacion and Mike Holper. Ginebra Kings won the prestigious Fiesta Cup recently and are firm believers and users of FE's Quantum Pendant and Flask. Allan Caidic and Samboy Lim presented Ginebra Kings jerseys to Paul Ting, Jeremy Looi and KC Phoon.
- Appearance by Daisy Reyes, famous Filipino actress and personality.
- Sharing of testimonials by Quantum Pendant users Dr Winona Bernas Amante (who was suffering from breast cancer and who has benefitted greatly from using FE's QP) , Mr Sam Amante (husband of Dr Winona), Ms Divine Gallaguez, Attorney Batacan (prominent lawyer and Legal Council to Congressman Valencia).
- Speech by Pastor Art Medina. What a powerful speaker ! Ahooo! (those who attended the function or watch the movie "300 " will understand what Ahooo! means).
- Closing Speech by Presidential Director KC Phoon, who as usual was truly inspirational!
- Lucky Draws and TV interviews by ABS-CBN's Swak program which will be broadcasted to the Filipino community in Philippines and worldwide.
